Literature.Title: NOVEL ANTI-MICROBIAL PEPTIDOMIMETIC COMPOUNDS AND METHODS TO CALCULATE ANTI-MICROBIAL ACTIVITY
Literature.Author: Hicks RP, Venugopal D, Bhonsle JB

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(MIC=100µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592(MIC=30µM),Mycobacterium fortuitum ATCC 110(no activity data),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 43223(MIC=3µM),Plasmodium falciparum W2(IC50=4.2µg/ml),Plasmodium falciparum D6(IC50=3.9µg/ml)
